dialogue.content: My asthma is acting up every time I go to the basement to do laundry.
Basements can be damp. Do you notice a musty smell down there?
Yes, it's very damp. I think there might be mold growing near the washer.
That's a huge trigger. Would you use a smart air quality monitor to check the levels?
I love seeing data on my phone, so a smart monitor sounds great.
I'll recommend one that alerts your phone when mold spores or humidity get too high.
A smart air quality monitor will tell me if the basement is safe for my asthma.
